nodes.text: "Red Hand" Magaran was a male Devaronian gun runner active during the Galactic War. At some point around 3641 BBY he made a deal with Tanno Vik to provide him a shipment of guns. Vik choose another buyer instead and after Magaran send bounty hunters after Vik, Vik simply killed him in his Nar Shaddaa office.
Red Hand Magaran appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during several of Tanno Vik's companion quests.
